messages.text:
Issuance of First Voucher to Continuing Students (Fall, 2020)

Published On:  Oct 29, 2020

Students are informed that the University has issued first voucher (Semester Enrollment fee + One Course fee) for Fall, 2020 semester to continuing students, who have made course selection from October 22, 2020 to October 29, 2020. 

You are directed to deposit payable voucher as per given schedule.

MS Computer Science (Fall 2020 Semester)

Merit List of Candidates Eligible for Interview Published

https://www.vu.edu.pk/NewsDetails.aspx?type=&NewsId=4348

Course selection is not working for MSCS students.

On 2020-11-05, MS CS department has reported that this error has been referred to the IT department and will get fixed soon.

Extension in due date of Need based Scholarship for Fall, 2020 
Published On:  Friday, November 6, 2020

All the students are informed that last date to apply for need based scholarship (Fall'2020 semester) has been extended till Thursday, November 12, 2020.

https://www.vu.edu.pk/NewsDetails.aspx?type=&NewsId=4350
On 2020-11-06, MSCS department sent out this email to all MSCS students from mscs_courseselection@vu.edu.pk

To find email addresses of other VU students, log in to your VU Gmail account and then visit this link:

https://contacts.google.com/directory

It will take some time to load. Eventually, it will display all the email addresses that are present in the VU organization.

The administrators have kept some addresses hidden probably for privacy and to fight spam.

You can look up other students from your batch, using your VU ID.

Kindly do not use abuse this system. So far, VU has not provided any way for students to communicate with each other. If you misuse it, then administrators can hide the directory, and we will not be able to discover our fellow batch members.

Issuance of 1st Voucher to Continuing Students (Fall-2020 Semester)
Published On:  Monday, November 9, 2020 

Students are informed that the University has issued first voucher (Semester Enrollment fee + One Course fee) for Fall, 2020 semester to continuing students, who have made course selection from October 29, 2020 to November 09, 2020. Furthermore, the University has already issued said fee voucher to those who made course selection prior to October 29, 2020.

You are directed to deposit payable voucher as per given schedule.

https://www.vu.edu.pk/NewsDetails.aspx?type=&NewsId=4351

VU has published the date of mid term exams.

2020-12-26 (December 26)

Source: https://www.vu.edu.pk/StudentServices/AcademicCalendar.aspx

Federal Minister for IT om, Syed Ameen Ul Haq visited Virtual University
Published On:  Tuesday, November 10, 2020 

> He also visited Virtual University, M.A Jinnah Campus (Head Office) and inaugurated the newly launched “Learning Management System” for VU students.

https://www.vu.edu.pk/NewsDetails.aspx?type=&NewsId=4352

⚠️ Attention MSCS 2020 students ⚠️
The bug in VULMS course selection has been fixed.

Please make your course selection ASAP.
